fund_manager.name: Aman Reddy
fund_manager.qualification: B.Sc. in Finance and a B.Sc. in Economics,

load.comment: In respect of each purchase of units via Lumpsum /Switch In/ Systematic Investment Plan (SIP) and Systematic Transfer Plan (STP-in),  Exit  Load  on  redemption/ switch out will be determined as follows:    In  case  units  are  redeemed/switched  out  within  12  months  from  the  date  of  allotment: A   T   o  1% of applicable NAV will be charged as Exit Load.    •  In  case  units  are  redeemed/switched  out  after  12  months  from  the  date  of  allotment, no Exit Load is applicable.  ny Exit Load charged (net off GST, if any) shall be credited back to the Scheme.  he Trustees shall have a right to prescribe or modify the Exit Load structure subject  to compliance of Regulations & relevant circulars.

value.scheme_objective: To generate long term capital appreciation by pursuing active management  and bottom-up investing, primarily in equity and equity related instruments across  sectors  and market  cap  spectrum. The  scheme  will  anchor  to  investing in  growth  businesses and is best suited for investors with long term investment horizon.  owever, there is no assurance that the investment objective of the scheme will be  achieved. The scheme does not guarantee or assure any returns.
value.suitable_for_investors: * • Capital Appreciation over long term. • Investment in a diversified portfolio consisting of equity and equity related instruments across market capitalization. *
value.type_of_scheme: An open ended dynamic equity scheme investing across large cap, mid cap, small  cap stocks.
